sn56.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
sn56.11:1.2: Tatra kho bhagava pancavaggiye bhikkhu amantesi:
sn56.11:2.3: Yo cayam kamesu kamasukhallikanuyogo hino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasamhito, yo cayam attakilamathanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasamhito.
sn56.11:2.4: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
sn56.11:3.1: Katama ca sa, bhikkhave, majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati?
sn56.11:3.3: sammaditthi sammasankappo sammavaca sammakammanto sammaajivo sammavayamo sammasati sammasamadhi.
sn56.11:3.4: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, majjhima patipada tathagatena abhisambuddha cakkhukarani nanakarani upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati.
sn56.11:4.1: Idam kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkham ariyasaccam—
sn56.11:4.2: jatipi dukkha, jarapi dukkha, byadhipi dukkho, maranampi dukkham, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampiccham na labhati tampi dukkham—sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
sn56.11:4.3: Idam kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam—
sn56.11:4.4: yayam tanha ponobbhavika nandiragasahagata tatratatrabhinandini, seyyathidam—
sn56.11:4.6: Idam kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam—
sn56.11:4.7: yo tassayeva tanhaya asesaviraganirodho cago patinissaggo mutti analayo.
sn56.11:4.8: Idam kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam—
sn56.11:5.1: ‘Idam dukkham ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:5.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkham ariyasaccam parinneyyan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.11:5.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkham ariyasaccam parinnatan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:6.1: ‘Idam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:6.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahatabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.11:6.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahinan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:7.1: ‘Idam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:7.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam sacchikatabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.11:7.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam sacchikatan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:8.1: ‘Idam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:8.2: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam bhavetabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe …pe… udapadi.
sn56.11:8.3: ‘Tam kho panidam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam bhavitan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn56.11:9.1: Yavakivanca me, bhikkhave, imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evam tiparivattam dvadasakaram yathabhutam nanadassanam na suvisuddham ahosi, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
sn56.11:10.1: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evam tiparivattam dvadasakaram yathabhutam nanadassanam suvisuddham ahosi, athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
sn56.11:10.3: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
sn56.11:10.5: Attamana pancavaggiya bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
sn56.11:11.1: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane ayasmato kondannassa virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
sn56.11:12.1: Pavattite ca pana bhagavata dhammacakke bhumma deva saddamanussavesum:
sn56.11:12.2: “etam bhagavata baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmin”ti.
sn56.11:12.3: Bhummanam devanam saddam sutva catumaharajika deva saddamanussavesum:
sn56.11:12.4: “etam bhagavata baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam, appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmin”ti.
sn56.11:12.5: Catumaharajikanam devanam saddam sutva tavatimsa deva …pe…
sn56.11:12.11: “etam bhagavata baranasiyam isipatane migadaye anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam appativattiyam samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmin”ti.
sn56.11:13.1: Itiha tena khanena tena layena tena muhuttena yava brahmaloka saddo abbhuggacchi.
sn56.11:13.2: Ayanca dasasahassilokadhatu sankampi sampakampi sampavedhi, appamano ca ularo obhaso loke paturahosi atikkamma devanam devanubhavanti.
sn56.11:14.1: Atha kho bhagava imam udanam udanesi:
sn56.11:14.2: “annasi vata bho, kondanno, annasi vata bho, kondanno”ti.
sn56.11:14.3: Iti hidam ayasmato kondannassa “annasikondanno” tveva namam ahositi.
